## display_startup_info
<Card type="info">
### `function` display_startup_info

Display Next.js-style startup information for the MCP server.

```python
from mcp_use.server.logging.startup import display_startup_info
```

**Parameters**
><ParamField body="server" type="MCPServer" required="True" >   Server name or configuration </ParamField>
><ParamField body="host" type="str" required="True" >   String value </ParamField>
><ParamField body="port" type="int" required="True" >   Integer value </ParamField>
><ParamField body="transport" type="Literal | None" default="None" >   Parameter value </ParamField>
><ParamField body="start_time" type="float" default="0.0" >   Parameter value </ParamField>

**Signature**
```python wrap
def display_startup_info(
server: MCPServer,
    host: str,
    port: int,
    transport: Literal | None = None,
    start_time: float = 0.0
):
```
